com.netflix.genie.client

Class ExecutionServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.common.client.BaseGenieClient
      • com.netflix.genie.client.ExecutionServiceClient

  • public final class ExecutionServiceClient
extends com.netflix.genie.common.client.BaseGenieClient
    Singleton class, which acts as the client library for the Genie Execution Service.

      • Fields inherited from class com.netflix.genie.common.client.BaseGenieClient

                                                            long pollTime)
                                                     throws com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException,
                                                            java.lang.InterruptedException
        Wait for job to complete, until the given timeout.
        Parameters:
        id - the Genie job ID to wait for completion
        blockTimeout - the time to block for (in ms), after which a GenieException will be thrown
        pollTime - the time to sleep between polling for job status
        Returns:
        the jobInfo for the job after completion
        Throws:
        com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException - For any other error.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - on timeout/thread errors
